did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Architectural plans, manuscripts, research materials, and financial records.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Typed notes which accompanied measured drawings Stotz presented as his Senior thesis at the College of Architecture, Cornell University, 1921; bill for house of Charles Humphrey, Ithaca, New York, 1828; and measured drawings by Stotz of houses in or near Ithaca, 1923.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Typed notes which accompanied measured drawings Stotz presented as his Senior thesis at the College of Architecture, Cornell University, 1921; bill for house of Charles Humphrey, Ithaca, New York, 1828; and measured drawings by Stotz of houses in or near Ithaca, 1923.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Charles Morse Stotz. Central New York Architectural Items, #3142. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single folder of material. Online guide unavailable.
